detailedText.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"A game by Coffee Stain - \"","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"Experience all the joys of Goat Simulator 3 in a handy portable mobile version with this latest addition to the Goat Simulator franchise. This third-person sandbox adventure game will let you live your dreams and become the literal GOAT. Traverse across the giant island of San Angora either solo or with a friend in two-player co-op, and leave a trail of chaos in your wake.","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"\"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"During 2023 two of our artists worked on Goat Simulator 3 Mobile with optimizing assets for the mobile platform.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Client: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.coffeestainstudios.com/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Coffee Stain Malm√∂","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Category: Graphics","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
